Steps To Reproduce:
1.Download the sample DocumentationViewer.java from http://www.eclipse.org/articles/Article-SWT-browser-widget/browser.html
2. Create a java project and add the org.eclipse.swt.gtk.linux.x86_64_3.2.1.v3235.jar to project
3. Build and run

Sorry for the late response.  Can you try this on a 3.3 stream build, such as 3.3M5eh ( http://download.eclipse.org/downloads/drops/S-3.3M5eh-200702220951/index.php ).  The Browser has undergone major changes since 3.2.1, and the 3.2.x stream is now closed, so it would be good to know if this now works for you with 3.3(I have not seen any other reports like this).  TIA.
Timed out, closing.  If you still see this problem with 3.3RC4 ( http://download.eclipse.org/downloads/drops/S-3.3RC4-200706081718/index.php ) then please reopen this report, thanks.
